## 🔮 About Village of Thousands

We are building an ecosystem of intelligent systems focused on:

- **Autonomous Reasoning** - Systems that can learn, reason, and improve over time
- **Memory Augmentation** - Vector-based memory systems with semantic understanding
- **Self-Improving AI** - Architectures designed for continuous self-enhancement
- **Hybrid Intelligence** - Combining multiple models, reasoning engines, and knowledge bases

<div align="center">
  <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/villageofthousands/vot1-assets/main/vot1-tech-vision.png" alt="VOT Technical Vision" width="80%">
</div>

## 🚀 Our Projects

<table>
  <tr>
    <td width="60%">
      <h3><a href="https://github.com/villageofthousands/vot1">🧠 VOT1</a></h3>
      <p>Our flagship autonomous intelligence system with advanced memory management, OWL reasoning, and self-improvement workflows.</p>
      <a href="https://github.com/villageofthousands/vot1"><img src="https://img.shields.io/github/stars/villageofthousands/vot1?style=social" alt="GitHub stars"></a>
    </td>
    <td width="40%" align="center">
      <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/villageofthousands/vot1-assets/main/vot1-badge.png" width="120px">
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td width="60%">
      <h3><a href="https://github.com/villageofthousands/owl-reason">🦉 OWL-Reason</a></h3>
      <p>A lightweight OWL reasoning engine for knowledge representation and logical inference in Python.</p>
      <a href="https://github.com/villageofthousands/owl-reason"><img src="https://img.shields.io/github/stars/villageofthousands/owl-reason?style=social" alt="GitHub stars"></a>
    </td>
    <td width="40%" align="center">
      <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/villageofthousands/vot1-assets/main/owl-reason-badge.png" width="120px">
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td width="60%">
      <h3><a href="https://github.com/villageofthousands/vector-memory">💾 Vector-Memory</a></h3>
      <p>A semantic memory management system supporting multiple vector database backends with advanced context retrieval.</p>
      <a href="https://github.com/villageofthousands/vector-memory"><img src="https://img.shields.io/github/stars/villageofthousands/vector-memory?style=social" alt="GitHub stars"></a>
    </td>
    <td width="40%" align="center">
      <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/villageofthousands/vot1-assets/main/vector-memory-badge.png" width="120px">
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>
